about_the_game:
• Announcement

    024/11/7 Store page is now open. Now under production.

A jeunable game with cheap and nostalgic graphics.

　-You are on your way home by train and have arrived at an unknown place.

　Take control of the player and walk through this world.

　You will find your way home.

  • Genre Old style ADVRPG with mouse & keyboard control

    ◆Chapter 1

    Unknown stations, underground passageways, facility management facilities, Karakuri houses, huge mazes ......

    You will need to unlock puzzle-like locks and solve riddles.

    ◆Chapter 2

    Unknown town, surveillance control center, unknown ecosystem, life there. ......

    Interact with people and gather information.

    ◆Chapter 3

    Unknown space, mysterious architecture, show house, lost things ......

    Well, what was I doing now? I think I forgot something, but oh well.

  • System

    ◆2D/3D common Mouse and Keyboard -

    Keyboard controls the player: Arrow keys (↑↓←→) to move, space to jump,

    Enter key to make decisions, look things up, talk, etc.

    Other keys: Various actions are tied to them, but there are conditions to be able to use them.

    Mouse click to select UI, etc.

  • Play time

    30 minutes or more.

  • Terms of Service

    ◆Distribution:

    You can distribute the game without permission.

    I am happy if you put the Steam link to the game.

    You can make profit from the secondary creation as long as you don't use the images and music in the game as they are.

    However, please keep in mind that sexual or cruel descriptions and unethical descriptions (erogoro gore) must be kept in mind.

  • SpecialThanks

    Suzuran /Chyoucho-kai / Mamitasu

  • Please refer to the “BFSH:

    How to Use ” PDF file included in the package for more details.

    For other details, please refer to the included Readme.txt file or the website.

　-This work is a work of fiction. It is in no way related to any real individuals or organizations.

　-Some expressions may not be suitable for minors. Please play at your own discretion.

content_descriptors.notes: Psychological fear, news of crimes such as sexual assault or murder, unethical speech or behavior, mild violence or bloodshed, and mild exposure.
